sentences.sContent: In her hurry, she stumbled and spilled the milk all over the floor.
sentences.sCn: 匆忙中她绊了一下，把牛奶洒得满地都是。

sentences.sContent: I make it into the darkness with only one stumble.
sentences.sCn: 我只踉跄了一下就把它弄进了黑暗中。

phrases.pCn: 无意中发现；偶然遇到，碰巧找到

remMethod.val: stum(看作stump， 树桩)+ble→树桩是绊脚之物→绊

words.tran: 绊跌者；有过失者；结结巴巴说话者；令人迷惑之事

trans.tranCn: 跌， 绊；结结巴巴地说话
trans.tranOther: to hit your foot against something or put your foot down awkwardly while you are walking or running, so that you almost fall
